logfile.description: Log file path, by default it saved to /var/log in `tmpfs`/memory, if you want you can change e.g. to: "/data/aa-proxy-rs.log" and this way it will be saved to SD card (appended, not replaced)

stats_interval.description: Interval of showing data transfer statistics in the log (0 = disabled) [seconds]

timeout_secs.description: Data transfer timeout [seconds], after this idle time the session will be reconnected

legacy.description: Enable legacy USB mode (some HeadUnits/cars needs this enabled for compatibility)

wired.description: Enable wired USB connection to phone (VID:PID should be specified, zero is wildcard and can be used for single or both fields) you can obtain it e.g. using `lsusb` after connecting phone, and then use e.g. "18d1:0" which will handle specified phone vendor ID (Google Pixel in this example)

dhu.description: Use a Google Android Auto Desktop Head Unit emulator instead of real HU device (will listen on TCP 5277 port)

udc.description: UDC Controller name (used in special configurations)

hexdump_level.description: Hex dump level [possible values: Disabled, DecryptedInput, RawInput, DecryptedOutput, RawOutput, All]

disable_console_debug.description: Disable debug level on console, save it only to logfile (helpful for `hexdump-level` option)

btalias.description: # BLE device name (how your bluetooth device is visible) by default it is WirelessAADongle-CPUSERIAL for dongle mode you need to set it to: AndroidAuto-xxxxx

connect.description: Auto-connect to phone and initiate connection empty string/no value: don't auto-connect, zeros/wildcard: iterate over all previously connected devices, set it to phone BT MAC address for connecting to this specific phone

bt_timeout_secs.description: Bluetooth handshake timeout [seconds], this is for rare cases when the phone stops responding, to prevent the bluetooth handshake deadlock with inifite waiting and not restarting connection again

iface.description: WLAN / Wi-Fi Hotspot interface (for obtaining IP and BSSID)

hostapd_conf.description: hostapd.conf file location (used for obtaining AP SSID and WPA passphrase)

keepalive.description: BT keep alive mode: BLE adapter doesn't power off after successful connection, so that the phone can remain connected (used in special configurations)

change_usb_order.description: Connect to usb before waiting bt connection

remove_bluetooth.description: Remove bluetooth service from service discovery response

remove_wifi.description: Remove wireless service from service discovery response

ev_battery_logger.description: Path to script executed when Android Auto session starts/stops and EV battery data is needed Argument "start" or "stop" is appended automatically when invoked

ev_connector_types.description:
List of EV connector types supported by your car. Possible values (separate multiple with a comma ','): 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_J1772, 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_MENNEKES, 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_CHADEMO, 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_COMBO_1, 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_COMBO_2, 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_TESLA_SUPERCHARGER, 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_GBT If left empty, the default is 
EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_MENNEKES.
